item.title: How to convert DJVU to PDF with table of contents
item.description: This article is based on the answer by pyrocrasty on StackExchange, and kcroker's dpsprep. It tells the essential idea and tools to convert DJVU to PDF with TOC preserved. A python script is given at the end to ease your usage.

item.title: Useful commandline tools in Linux/Mac OS X
item.description:
This article keeps collecting useful command-line tools in Linux or Mac OS X (via homebrew). It will be continuously updated.

It includes the following functions:

  • tools for downloading videos or webpages;

  • useful tools on dealing with documents (.txt, .pdf, .djvu, etc.);

  • tricks on image operations, like resize, format conversion, etc.; and

  • basic video operations.

item.title: Setup powerline in Vim for Linux/OS X
item.description: To use powerline in VIM, the default plugin vim-powerline may have been out-of-date. I suggest to use the modern plugin, vim-airline, which provides amazing status-bar settings and powerline styles. In additional, it has accompanied plugin vim-airline-themes to allows users to easily adjust powerline styles.

item.title: Show applications in tiling or overlapping mode in i3
item.description: This blog collects some key but tricky configurations that used for i3 window manager. For more, one may refer to the official user’s guide.

item.title: Keyring supports for Git to avoid repeating passwords
item.description: This article guides you how to set up keychain/keyring to avoid typing your password repeatedly, when using git.

item.title: Linux下快速浏览粘贴表情的解决方案
item.description: 长期以来，Linux下楼主只能按一般方式用file manager查找和插入图片的方式，由于 表情一般很多而导致查找非常不便。一不留神，终于让楼主发现了一个好的解决方法。
